title: War Ground
description: Offline third-person shooting game with dynamic combat.
shortDesc: Fast-paced TPS shooter with weapon inventory, missions, smart AI, and offline gameplay. Unlock guns, complete objectives, and fight enemy forces across challenging battlegrounds with responsive mobile controls and stunning visuals.
roles: Sole developer responsible for game design, systems architecture, and production pipeline.
Engineered third-person shooter systems including aiming, combat, AI, and cover logic.
Built weapon inventory with unlock progression, ammo tracking, and switching system.
Implemented IAPs and rewarded ads for unlocking weapons, health boosts, and coins.
Designed adaptive UI for mobile devices, including HUD, inventory wheel, and mission panel.
Handled optimization for smooth performance on low to mid-range Android devices.
Managed Play Store publishing, versioning, analytics, and monetization integration.

contributions.name: Combat & Core Systems
contributions.shortDesc: Built immersive TPS gunplay with smart AI and tactical controls.
details: Implemented responsive third-person shooting with zoom and dynamic reticles.
Designed AI behaviors like patrol, cover-seek, flank, and retreat.
Integrated crouch, sprint, reload animations and third-person camera behaviors.
Developed accurate damage detection using raycasts and colliders.

contributions.name: Inventory & Progression
contributions.shortDesc: Developed scalable inventory with weapon unlocks and upgrades.
details: Created a modular inventory system using ScriptableObjects and custom editor tools.
Enabled dynamic weapon switching, ammo tracking, and reload logic.
Designed progression system with unlockable weapons and level-based access.
Stored player inventory state using persistent data and secure saves.

contributions.name: Monetization (IAP & Ads)
contributions.shortDesc: Integrated rewarded ads and IAPs for premium gameplay elements.
details: Integrated Google Play Billing Library for in-app purchases (coin packs, premium guns).
Added rewarded video ads for free boosts, ammo, and continues.
Balanced monetization to avoid paywalls and maintain fair progression.
Tracked transactions and rewarded ad interactions using event analytics.

contributions.name: User Interface & HUD
contributions.shortDesc: Designed clean UI for immersive gameplay and control clarity.
details: Built responsive HUD elements including health, ammo, radar, objectives, and coins.
Implemented contextual prompts, weapon overlays, and score summaries.
Optimized for touch UI with clear button placement and thumbstick zones.
Supported pause menu, mission briefing panels, and settings with localization support.

contributions.name: Optimization & Deployment
contributions.shortDesc: Ensured smooth performance and publishing readiness.
details: Optimized scenes with light baking, LODs, object pooling, and batching.
Maintained stable performance (50â€“60 FPS) on budget devices.
Reduced APK size using asset stripping and texture compression.
Published on Google Play with ASO metadata, store graphics, and update management.
